home.welcome_description: Welcome to the official documentation for the Lopple bot. Here you will find detailed information about how it works and the available commands.

overview.title: Quick Overview
overview.description: Lopple is a Discord bot developed in Python, designed to be the core of a Splatoon 3 tournament called Stellaris Phantasm.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1:
Lopple is part of a community-organized Splatoon 3 tournament.
The tournament is called Stellaris Phantasm.
faq.a2: Any Splatoon 3 player with a Discord account can sign up.
faq.a3: You can register via the Sendou.ink.
faq.q4: Where can I see the teams?

cta.title: Want to see how Lopple works?
cta.description: Join our official server and discover all the exclusive features Lopple offers to the Splatoon community.

round_pull.descripcion: The bot provides 10 weapons to play.

extrapull.descripcion: Consumes an extra pull to get another 10 weapons.
extrapull.requisitos_valor: Have at least one extra pull and be registered with /register_team

test_pull.descripcion: Get 10 weapons as a test to see how /round_pull works.

register_team.descripcion: Register your team with at least one member.

add_member_team.descripcion: Add a member to your team.

purgeall.descripcion: Deletes all messages in the current channel.

delete_registers.descripcion: Deletes all registrations in the current channel.

change_extrapulls.descripcion: Modifies (adds, subtracts or resets) the extra pulls of a specific team.

edit_registered_teams.descripcion: Edits teams that have been previously registered.

torneo.subtitulo: Tournament based on RNG and gacha mechanics: each team gets 10 random weapons per round + extra pulls.

informacion_general.formato_valor: All modes. Groups in 3 single-elimination brackets (Alpha, Beta, Gamma).
informacion_general.premio1: Sendou badges for winners of Crimson, Lumi√®re and Serenade.

reglas_basicas.regla3: Single elimination in three brackets (Crimson, Lumi√®re, Serenade).
reglas_basicas.inscripcion1: Register up to 15 min before start.
reglas_basicas.inscripcion2: Team captain must join Discord before starting.
reglas_basicas.plantilla2: Substitutes allowed if fewer than 4 starters or not exceeding 6 total.
reglas_basicas.alias_texto: Allowed if real identity is clearly indicated; no inappropriate content.
reglas_basicas.limite1: 10 min to use the bot and join lobby; thereafter, ‚àí1 point every 5 min.
reglas_basicas.limite2: Between matches, host confirms changes or extra pulls.
reglas_basicas.limite3: Max. 35 min (Bo3), 50 min (Bo5); past that, staff decides score.
reglas_basicas.desconexiones_texto: 1 replay per set if after 2:30 min and opponent has < 50 points. Cancel set and keep weapons/equipment (except substitute). Lobby disconnects do not count.
reglas_basicas.cancelacion1: First 10 s: selection errors or rerolls ‚Üí replay.
reglas_basicas.cancelacion2: During match: using weapon off-list ‚Üí opponent wins the point.
reglas_basicas.prohibido_texto: Intentional throws to manipulate badges incur penalty: cannot win badges.

reglas_especiales.sistema_texto: At the start of each round, each team must use Round Pull (mandatory) to get 10 valid weapons for the set. After that, they receive 1 optional Extra Pull.
reglas_especiales.detalle1: 10 distinct weapons per pull; variable probabilities (see Discord server).
reglas_especiales.detalle2: Do not duplicate weapons in the same set; always use the latest list.
reglas_especiales.detalle3: If the SplatScreen is banned, use the alternative weapon variant.
reglas_especiales.tp_round_dd: Mandatory at round start; marks the set‚Äôs beginning.
reglas_especiales.tp_extra_dd: Optional; can be used after Round Pull or during round. Not valid after final game without new round.

privacidad.p1: Lopple does not collect or store personal data from users. Our website is designed solely to provide technical information about the bot and the project.
privacidad.p2: No forms or subscription systems that collect data are used.
privacidad.p3: If functionalities involving data collection are implemented in the future, this policy will be duly updated.

cookies.p1: This website does not use cookies, so no data related to user navigation on Lopple is stored on the device.
cookies.p2: If cookies are implemented, prior consent will be requested according to current regulations.
